title: "Soft robots gain new strength and make virtual reality gloves feel more real"
excerpt: "However, soft robots currently lack the strength needed to perform these sorts of tasks. This long-standing challenge — making soft robots stronger without compromising their ability to gently interact with their environment — has limited the development of these devices."
